name: Global Creative
tag_list: design-agency, web-design, ecommerce, email-marketing, branding, logo-design
overview:
Global Creative is a leading design agency based between Northampton and Leicester. Our team are always developing new technologies and we excel in making the impossible – possible. We don’t just develop beautiful websites, we make them work for you. We can integrate your ecommerce platforms with your social media channels, develop Facebook shops and iPhone / Android apps.

DYNAMIC, DIGITAL DESIGN Award winning, independent, digital design agency specialising in website design, e-commerce, branding, graphic design, SEO, advertising, bespoke Content Management Systems, GUI, flash, video animation and whatever else you’d like to throw at us! We have worked with some outstanding corporate and consumer clients, producing intelligent websites, digital solutions and engaging design. Although we work with a variety of clients from all over the world, we are ideally situated in the Midlands and service a wide area; London, Milton Keynes, Bedford, Northampton, Leicester, Peterborough, and Birmingham.

Our years of experience working with various consumer giants, has provided us with understanding and expertise on how to successfully raise a brands image and expand its reach through skilled use of digital media.

We are a vibrant agency that lead current trends in design and development and hold a wealth of experience in a variety of specialist areas. We pull talent in locally and internationally to provide our clients with cutting edge solutions.
